TopicTitle: [AAR] The Grand Tour - Voyage To The Planets

Articles.Content: Yup, unless I missed something, Jeb just broke. They might have to do something with him, if you know what I mean...

Man... I don't quite know what to say... Jeb, I thought we were friends!

And the next chapter will be NEXT WEEK? I don't have anything against that, but I do have something about these cliffhangers! I'm dying here because of the suspense!
Jeb found out about KSC's secret plans. Callin' it now, just in case.

NASA? No crew at the Duna base? And Jeb... Uh-oh.

Also, on a semi-related note, look who just showed up in my Astronaut Complex:

Needless to say, we hired him instantly, although my grand tour has already reached the Eve landing (about to land on Eve, and I've been to Mun, Minmus, and Gilly thus far), so he won't be seeing the business end of a taser, luckily

So Jeb looses it in the chapter titled "Whispers".

You're not going all Lovecraftian horrors on us are you?

Maybe Jeb is just a bit paranoid and smells sabotage (which would be understandable)... Anyway, as I said, weird things are going on. Nothing went wrong for too long, stuff is going to be badly escalating soon.
I say Jeb suspects BERTY to be involved and shut everything down as a precaution.

I say Jeb suspects BERTY to be involved and shut everything down as a precaution.

That would be my guess. The throwaway line about "Isn't that just like BERTY's terminal?" is a dead giveaway. BERTY's back. http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/ChekhovsGun

It looks like Jeb finally broke... Have you tried turning it off and back on?

Oh, and DO NOT attempt this fix on BERTY!

It looks like Jeb finally broke... Have you tried turning it off and back on?

Oh, and DO NOT attempt this fix on BERTY!

Jeb:I'm gonna fix you up BERTY!

BERTY:You are acting highly illog-

Jeb: now to turn him back on again.

*clunck*

BERTY:oh it's you.

BERTY:it's been a long time.

Jeb: what?!

BERTY:but look at me talking to you when there's science to be done!

?????: SPAAAAAAAAAAACCCCCEEEEE.

Jeb:I'm gonna fix you up BERTY!

BERTY:You are acting highly illog-

Jeb: now to turn him back on again.

*clunck*

BERTY:oh it's you.

BERTY:it's been a long time.

Jeb: what?!

BERTY:but look at me talking to you when there's science to be done!

?????: SPAAAAAAAAAAACCCCCEEEEE.

Haha, I nearly died there

I told you BERTY would be back right away (Maybe just not the way we expected...)

What. the. actual. Fu**.

This is getting more and more intense. Something big is going to happen very soon. I sense it has something to do with that other AI...

http://www.dramabutton.com/

That is my only response.

Dun dun duuuun!

Seriously we need info on Laythe now.

I think the crew is at the 'Source' where there is some kind of glass dome with planet, water, a beach and a warm temp.

:dun dun dun: intensifies!

Well, I don't know how you did it, but this just got a whole lot more sinister.

Thank you

Yup, unless I missed something, Jeb just broke. They might have to do something with him, if you know what I mean...
Man... I don't quite know what to say... Jeb, I thought we were friends!

And the next chapter will be NEXT WEEK? I don't have anything against that, but I do have something about these cliffhangers! I'm dying here because of the suspense!

Sorry, it means they are working Next week is not so long from now you know - plus I'll give you some sneak-peak screenshots to make waiting easier.

Jeb found out about KSC's secret plans. Callin' it now, just in case.

No comment.

NASA? No crew at the Duna base? And Jeb... Uh-oh.

Also, on a semi-related note, look who just showed up in my Astronaut Complex:

-snip-

Needless to say, we hired him instantly, although my grand tour has already reached the Eve landing (about to land on Eve, and I've been to Mun, Minmus, and Gilly thus far), so he won't be seeing the business end of a taser, luckily

That's really cool - just be careful, he's a great engineer but he's not so young anymore!

So Jeb looses it in the chapter titled "Whispers".

You're not going all Lovecraftian horrors on us are you?

Huh? What? Lovecractian horrors? This is... an interesting idea actually

Maybe Jeb is just a bit paranoid and smells sabotage (which would be understandable)... Anyway, as I said, weird things are going on. Nothing went wrong for too long, stuff is going to be badly escalating soon.

No comment.

I say Jeb suspects BERTY to be involved and shut everything down as a precaution.
That would be my guess. The throwaway line about "Isn't that just like BERTY's terminal?" is a dead giveaway. BERTY's back. http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/ChekhovsGun

No comment.

It looks like Jeb finally broke... Have you tried turning it off and back on?

Oh, and DO NOT attempt this fix on BERTY!

Hard to believe, but there is trope for that (kinda): http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/PercussiveMaintenance

Jeb:I'm gonna fix you up BERTY!

BERTY:You are acting highly illog-

Jeb: now to turn him back on again.

*clunck*

BERTY:oh it's you.

BERTY:it's been a long time.

Jeb: what?!

BERTY:but look at me talking to you when there's science to be done!

?????: SPAAAAAAAAAAACCCCCEEEEE.

Haha, I nearly died there

I told you BERTY would be back right away (Maybe just not the way we expected...)

Sneak-peak screenshot!

BTW, everytime I see new mods such as glorious Better Atmospheres I can help myself but imagine how much more good-looking could "Grand Tour" be if it was started today:

Edited April 18, 2014 by czokletmuss
No more landing for Rozer. He keeps nearly killing the crew!

great chapter didn't see Jeb coming round the hatch with a tazer! Brilliant.

I don't feel we've had enough Captain Kirk fighting on Duna.

Looking forward to the next part soon.

I think Rozer's going to abandon the other 2 on Duna, just like he did with *SPOILER*sid on laythe.

And then jeb flies the space station into them .

No more landing for Rozer. He keeps nearly killing the crew!

Hey, this time he actually saved them!

I think Rozer's going to abandon the other 2 on Duna

Why should he? They have more than enough fuel and leaving them there would endanger the mission. That's one upside of his character I guess, unlike Jeb, he's somewhat predictable because he at least tries to act logically.

Why should he? They have more than enough fuel and leaving them there would endanger the mission. That's one upside of his character I guess, unlike Jeb, he's somewhat predictable because he at least tries to act logically.

This is Czokletmuss we're talking about, nothing is consistent, Rozer might snap next.

This is Czokletmuss we're talking about, nothing is consistent, Rozer might snap next.

I was creating these characters for more than 12 months and I think they are pretty consistent, that is they are acting accordingly to their personality traits (actually some of them are quite Troperific I may add, which wasn't really the intention) which didn't change in most cases.

Oh and BTW nobody has guessed what's going to happen in the next chapter

Must admit there is quite a lot of mood whiplash though...

Sure, but Mood Whiplash and Out of Character are two entriely different things :>
I think I guess-a zombie attacks them and they flee Duna

Given that face you've posted previously czo, BERTY is back, and he is in a BAD MOOD.

(of course, berty would have transferred his consciousness to the duna lab before he was shut down, so as to avoid death).

BTW, great job with this AAR.
I just guessing Jeb's gonna turn the tazer on himself after tazering the others.
